TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit AdCreatedEventArgs extends System.EventArgs

summary.span: 提供 控制項的 事件資料。

span.span: Provides data for the event of the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 就會引發事件時控制項在網頁上顯示通知。The event is raised when the control displays an advertisement on the page. 如需執行個體的初始屬性值的清單，請參閱建構函式。For a list of initial property values for an instance of , see the constructor. 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何指定及程式碼的處理常式事件。The following code example demonstrates how to specify and code a handler for the event. 它會取得與公告相關聯的 URL 時控制項，便會建立並將它顯示在控制項下方。It gets the URL associated with the advertisement when the control gets created and displays it below the control. 這個範例需要在下列範例中所列的 XML 檔案 (Ads.xml)。This example requires the XML file (Ads.xml) listed in the example below. [!code-aspx-csharp[Classic AdCreatedEventArgs Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic AdCreatedEventArgs Example/CS/sourcecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[Classic AdCreatedEventArgs Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic AdCreatedEventArgs Example/VB/sourcevb.aspx#1)] 下列程式碼範例示範如何將 XML 檔案，其中包含通知資訊的格式。The following code example demonstrates how to format the XML file that contains the advertisement information. 如需有關 XML 檔案的詳細資訊，請參閱屬性類別。For more information on the XML file, see the property of the class. ``` image1.jpg http://www.microsoft.com Microsoft Main Site 80 Topic1 This is the caption for Ad#1 image2.jpg http://www.wingtiptoys.com Wingtip Toys 80 Topic2 This is the caption for Ad#2 ``` [!code-aspx-csharp[AdCreatedEventHandler#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/AdCreatedEventHandler/CS/adcreatedeventhandlercs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[AdCreatedEventHandler#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/AdCreatedEventHandler/VB/adcreatedeventhandlervb.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(class System.Collections.IDictionary adProperties) cil managed

param.name: adProperties
param.span: ，包含 XML 檔中的廣告屬性。

span.span: A containing the advertisement properties from the XML file.

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用這個建構函式建立並初始化的新執行個體類別。Use this constructor to create and initialize a new instance of the class. 下表顯示的執行個體的初始屬性值。The following table shows initial property values for an instance of . |屬性Property|Initial valueInitial value| |--------------|-------------------| ||值`adProperties`參數如果`adProperties`參數不是`null`，否則為空。The value of the `adProperties` parameter if the `adProperties` parameter is not `null`; otherwise, an empty .| ||如果`adProperties`參數不是`null`中的值`adProperties`參數表示的替代文字; 否則。If the `adProperties` parameter is not `null`, the value in the `adProperties` parameter that represents the alternate text; otherwise, .| ||如果`adProperties`參數不是`null`中的值`adProperties`參數表示的影像 URL，以顯示; 否則。If the `adProperties` parameter is not `null`, the value in the `adProperties` parameter that represents the URL of the image to display; otherwise, .| ||如果`adProperties`參數不是`null`中的值`adProperties`參數，表示為，否則瀏覽 URL 。If the `adProperties` parameter is not `null`, the value in the `adProperties` parameter that represents the URL to navigate to; otherwise, .|

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property AdProperties As IDictionary
public: property System::Collections::IDictionary ^ AdProperties { System::Collections::IDictionary ^ get(); };

summary.span: 取得 物件，包含目前所顯示廣告的所有廣告屬性。

span.span: Gets a object that contains all the advertisement properties for the currently displayed advertisement.

value.span: ，包含目前所顯示廣告的廣告屬性清單。

span.span: A that contains a list of advertisement properties for the currently displayed advertisement.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用屬性來取得物件，其中包含目前顯示的廣告的廣告內容。Use the property to get a object that contains the advertisement properties for the currently displayed advertisement. 索引鍵，值物件屬於類型。The keys and values of the object are of type . 控制項隨機選取公告每次在網頁上顯示的控制項。The control randomly selects an advertisement each time the control is displayed on the Web page. 選取的廣告的屬性會從 通告 XML 檔案擷取並儲存在物件。The attributes for the selected advertisement are extracted from the advertisement XML file and stored in a object. 當控制項建立的新執行個體類別以初始化屬性，取得物件。When the control creates a new instance of the class, the property gets initialized with the object. 自訂屬性的相關公告，例如廣告標題，也可以包含在通知 XML 檔案。Custom attributes about an advertisement, such as an advertisement caption, can also be included in the advertisement XML file. 使用此屬性在事件處理常式來取得自訂屬性。Use this property in the event handler to get the custom attributes. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性事件處理常式，以提供自訂的標題。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property in the event handler to provide a custom caption. [!code-aspx-csharp[Classic AdCreatedEventArgs.AdProperties Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic AdCreatedEventArgs.AdProperties Example/CS/sourcecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[Classic AdCreatedEventArgs.AdProperties Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic AdCreatedEventArgs.AdProperties Example/VB/sourcevb.aspx#1)] [!code-xml[Classic AdCreatedEventArgs.AdProperties Example#1](~/samples/snippets/common/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic AdCreatedEventArgs.AdProperties Example/Common/Ads.xml#1)] 下列程式碼範例示範如何在廣告 XML 檔中包含公告的自訂屬性。The following code example demonstrates how to include custom attributes about an advertisement in the advertisement XML file. 如需有關 XML 檔案的詳細資訊，請參閱屬性類別。For more information on the XML file, see the property of the class. ``` image1.jpg http://www.microsoft.com Microsoft Main Site 80 Topic1 This is the caption for Ad#1 image2.jpg http://www.wingtiptoys.com Wingtip Toys 80 Topic2 This is the caption for Ad#2 ```

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ AlternateText { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定在沒有廣告影像時，顯示於 控制項的替代文字。

span.span: Gets or sets the alternate text displayed in the control when the advertisement image is unavailable.

summary.span: 支援工具提示功能的瀏覽器會將這個文字顯示為廣告的工具提示。

span.span: Browsers that support the ToolTips feature display this text as a ToolTip for the advertisement.

value.span: 當沒有影像時，取代廣告影像顯示的文字。

span.span: The text displayed in place of the advertisement image if the image is unavailable.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用屬性來指定要顯示如果映像中指定的文字屬性會無法使用。Use the property to specify the text to display if the image specified in the property is not available. 在瀏覽器支援工具提示功能，此文字也會顯示為公告的工具提示。In browsers that support the ToolTips feature, this text also appears as a ToolTip for the advertisement. 個別的 XML 檔案包含的屬性顯示的廣告。A separate XML file contains the properties for the displayed advertisement. 自動控制集屬性與 XML 檔案中相對應的替代文字項目。The control automatically sets the property with the corresponding alternate text entry in the XML file. 這個屬性也可用來以程式設計方式設定的替代文字。This property can also be used to programmatically set the alternate text. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何以程式設計方式設定屬性。The following code example demonstrates how to programmatically set the property. [!code-aspx-csharp[AdCreatedEventArgsAlternateText#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/AdCreatedEventArgsAlternateText/CS/adcreatedeventargsalternatetextcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[AdCreatedEventArgsAlternateText#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/AdCreatedEventArgsAlternateText/VB/adcreatedeventargsalternatetextvb.aspx#1)] 下列程式碼範例示範如何將 XML 檔案，其中包含通知資訊的格式。The following code example demonstrates how to format the XML file that contains the advertisement information. 如需有關 XML 檔案的詳細資訊，請參閱屬性類別。For more information on the XML file, see the property of the class. ``` image1.jpg http://www.microsoft.com Microsoft Main Site 80 Topic1 This is the caption for Ad#1 image2.jpg http://www.wingtiptoys.com Wingtip Toys 80 Topic2 This is the caption for Ad#2 ```

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ ImageUrl { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定 控制項中顯示的影像的 URL。

span.span: Gets or sets the URL of an image to display in the control.

value.span: 控制項中顯示的影像 URL，

span.span: The URL of an image to display in the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用屬性來指定影像的 URL，若要顯示的廣告控制項。Use the property to specify the URL of an image to display for an advertisement in the control. 您可以使用相對或絕對的 URL。You can use a relative or an absolute URL. 相對的 URL 相關的網頁或使用者控制項位置之影像的位置不在伺服器上指定完整路徑。A relative URL relates the location of the image to the location of the Web page or user control without specifying a complete path on the server. 路徑是相對於網頁上的位置。The path is relative to the location of the Web page. 這可讓您容易到另一個目錄移動整個站台伺服器上而不更新程式碼中的映像的路徑。This makes it easier to move the entire site to another directory on the server without updating the path to the image in code. 絕對 URL 會提供完整路徑，所以移動到另一個目錄的站台需要更新程式碼。An absolute URL provides the complete path, so moving the site to another directory requires updating the code. 個別的 XML 檔案包含的屬性顯示的廣告。A separate XML file contains the properties for the displayed advertisement. 自動控制集屬性與對應的影像 URL 包含通知資訊的 XML 檔案中的項目。The control automatically sets the property with the corresponding image URL entry in the XML file containing the advertisement information. 這個屬性也可用來以程式設計方式設定影像 URL。This property can also be used to programmatically set the image URL. > [!NOTE] > 如果您使用廣告檔案，並指定此屬性的相對 URL，URL 是相對於公告檔案位於目錄。If you use an advertisement file and specify a relative URL for this property, the URL is relative to the directory that the advertisement file is located in. 如果您設定此屬性，直接與相對的 URL，而不使用通知檔案中，URL 是相對於網頁或使用者控制項，其中包含目錄控制項。If you set this property directly with a relative URL, instead of using the advertisement file, the URL is relative to the directory of the page or user control that contains the control. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何以程式設計方式設定屬性。The following code example demonstrates how to programmatically set the property. [!code-aspx-csharp[AdCreatedEventArgsImageUrl#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/AdCreatedEventArgsImageUrl/CS/adcreatedeventargsimageurlcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[AdCreatedEventArgsImageUrl#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/AdCreatedEventArgsImageUrl/VB/adcreatedeventargsimageurlvb.aspx#1)] 下列程式碼範例示範如何將 XML 檔案，其中包含通知資訊的格式。The following code example demonstrates how to format the XML file that contains the advertisement information. 如需有關 XML 檔案的詳細資訊，請參閱屬性類別。For more information on the XML file, see the property of the class. ``` image1.jpg http://www.microsoft.com Microsoft Main Site 80 Topic1 This is the caption for Ad#1 image2.jpg http://www.wingtiptoys.com Wingtip Toys 80 Topic2 This is the caption for Ad#2 ```

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ NavigateUrl { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定按一下 控制項時，所要顯示的 Web 網頁。

span.span: Gets or sets the Web page to display when the control is clicked.

value.span: 按一下 控制項時，所要顯示的 Web 網頁。

span.span: The Web page to display when the control is clicked.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用屬性來指定網頁上顯示時按一下控制項時。Use the property to specify the Web page to display when the control is clicked. 這個屬性的常見用法是將重新導向瀏覽，當按一下控制項時，可以計算次數頁面使用者已按下再繼續進行到目的地 URL 公告。A common use for this property is to redirect the navigation, when the control is clicked, to a page that can count the number of times the user clicked the advertisement before proceeding to the destination URL. 個別的 XML 檔案包含的屬性顯示的廣告。A separate XML file contains the properties for the displayed advertisement. 自動控制集屬性與對應的瀏覽 URL 項目 XML 檔案中。The control automatically sets the property with the corresponding navigation URL entry in the XML file. 這個屬性也可用來以程式設計方式設定瀏覽 URL。This property can also be used to programmatically set the navigation URL. > [!NOTE] > 如果您使用廣告檔案，並指定此屬性的相對 URL，URL 是相對於公告檔案位於目錄。If you use an advertisement file and specify a relative URL for this property, the URL is relative to the directory that the advertisement file is located in. 如果您設定此屬性，直接與相對的 URL，而不使用通知檔案中，URL 是相對於網頁或使用者控制項，其中包含目錄控制項。If you set this property directly with a relative URL, instead of using the advertisement file, the URL is relative to the directory of the page or user control that contains the control. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何以程式設計方式設定屬性。The following code example demonstrates how to programmatically set the property. [!code-aspx-csharp[AdCreatedEventArgsNavigateUrl#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/AdCreatedEventArgsNavigateUrl/CS/adcreatedeventargsnavigateurlcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[AdCreatedEventArgsNavigateUrl#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/AdCreatedEventArgsNavigateUrl/VB/adcreatedeventargsnavigateurlvb.aspx#1)] 下列程式碼範例示範如何將 XML 檔案，其中包含通知資訊的格式。The following code example demonstrates how to format the XML file that contains the advertisement information. 如需有關 XML 檔案的詳細資訊，請參閱屬性類別。For more information on the XML file, see the property of the class. ``` image1.jpg http://www.microsoft.com Microsoft Main Site 80 Topic1 This is the caption for Ad#1 image2.jpg http://www.wingtiptoys.com Wingtip Toys 80 Topic2 This is the caption for Ad#2 ```
